Holds all the listeners

Instance Methods

addEventListener(type : String, listener : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
type {string} A string representing the event type to listen for.
listener {function} The callback function that will be fired when the event occurs
Adds a listener for a specific event

dispatchEvent(event : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
event {Event} the event object
Fires the event, ie pretends that the event has happened

emit(eventName : String, ?data : Dynamic) : Bool

parameters
eventName {String} The name of the event.
returns
Boolean
Emit an event to all registered event listeners.

removeAllEventListeners(eventName : String) : Void

parameters
eventName {string} A string representing the event type which will have all its listeners removed
Removes all the listeners that were active for the specified event type

removeEventListener(type : String, listener : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
type {string} A string representing the event type which will have its listener removed
listener {function} The callback function that was be fired when the event occured
Removes the specified listener that was assigned to the specified event type
